BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
          Date: 01/08/2009 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 13 / 2009 
 
Sub:   PERMISSION  FOR  ACCESS TO  THE  VEHICLE UP TO TARMAC OF PATNA   
          AIRPORT IN  RESPECT OF SHRI LALU PRASAD YADAV, HON’BLE MEMBER  
          OF PARLIAMENT AND HIS WIFE SMT.RABRI   DEVI, EX-CM, BIHAR 
 
With reference to BCAS Circular No.36/2005 dated 30.08.2005, Shri Lalu Prasad Yadav, 
Hon’ble Member of Parliament and his wife Smt. Rabri Devi, Ex-CM, Bihar are permitted  access 
in their  own vehicle up to the tarmac of Patna Airport during their  departure / arrival by air at 
Patna  airport.  
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
(M.Malaviya) 
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution: As per list attached. 
Copy to: 
1. MCA ( Shri S Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary ) :  w.r.t MCA letter No.AV.13024/39
